channel.title: What does Bot Nuke Day mean for RuneScape client hacking?
channel.description:
I haven't visited the runescape cheating scene in a long time, but this update caught my attention.
As far as i know from researching, the obfuscation of the client has been increased so writing a new updater would take ages.
Also, client loading was always a concern, but now every time the game loads a unique applet is loaded as well, which i don't want to even bother looking into.
And I heard a rumor that IDs in the game might be dynamic now, adding yet more time to find a way around that, but I haven't looked into it.
Anyone know anything else towards what this update did to prevent "reflection"? I expected them to actually "Stop" botting, not just "Make it harder". From what I see this is just a road-bump.
EDIT: And if they rewrote the way objects are stored in memory by removing instance variables and storing everything in a scrambled multidimensional array, that'll be fun to decode and figure out how/where everything is stored...

item.title: What does Bot Nuke Day mean for RuneScape client hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:6, topic:419521”][quote author=Tenac link=topic=522069.msg3795438#msg3795438 date=1319583362]

Long time no see bro

Thanks man, it’s been ages.

I came across this runescape thread which was pretty funny

RuneScape

RuneScape Forum - Community Forums for Clans, Feedback & Discussion

Join the discussion on the official RuneScape forum. Share your thoughts with the community, ask questions, find help, learn about events and much more.


jagex mod posted it on page 3 and stickied it lol

I looked at RSBuddy and it’s so heavily reflection or bcel based, the code looks 95% stolen from RSBot. Whoever has made/maintained an updater knows how frustrating and time consuming it is, and it’ll be weeks/months to rewrite every hook if anyone even bothers hahaha

EDIT: WAIT A MINUTE, is RSBuddy = PowerBot = RSBot??? I completely lost track of what happened to RSBot and Quaters. I see you’re still around though Speljohan lol
[/quote]Jagex threw me out of the game (with a C&D) shortly after Qauters and our netadmin at that time kicked me out in a wave of greed.[/quote]
Aint it about a bitch when a niggah gets kicked out of some good money making scheme.

sadface achieved knowing I lost moneys.

Read full topic
item.source: What does Bot Nuke Day mean for RuneScape client hacking?

item.title: What does Bot Nuke Day mean for RuneScape client hacking?
item.dc:creator: @SpeedIsMeh SpeedIsMeh
item.description:
@SpeedIsMeh wrote:

Frell:

So it is true, the bots orIginated from our members?

Yes however, Jacmob rewrote RSBot (RSBot2) and then because of the aforementioned netadmin, Jacmob decided to create a new site & bot (the bot is currently based off RSBot2 but with many major changes and improvements, also is being completely rewritten) called RSBuddy where he pretty much manages everything.

Read full topic
